verse: काम्योपासनयार्थयन्त्यनुदिनं किंचित्फलं स्वेप्सितम्, केचित् स्वर्गमथापवर्गमपरे योगादि यज्ञादिभः । अस्माकं यदुनंदनांघ्रि युगल ध्यानावधानार्थिनाम्, किं लोकेन दमेन किं नृपतिना स्वर्गापवर्गेश्च किम् ॥
overall_meaning: What fruits are desired daily by some for the sake of desired worship, some seeking heaven or liberation like others through practices starting with yoga and sacrifices? For us, what is achieved by focusing on the feet of Krishna, the couple for meditation, and what is heaven or liberation to the world, control, or a king?
